title: FS; T206 Nap Lajoie portrait - RAW

posts.post_title: FS; T206 Nap Lajoie portrait - RAW
posts.post_content:
****CARD IS SOLD****

Up for sale is a presentable T206 Nap Lajoie portrait - RAW - Card displays nicely. Guaranteed to grade numerically if that is your thing!
 
Notable blemishes are on the reverse - light glue reside in the center and tiny paper pull spots in all 4 corner regions from scrapbook removal.

Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
